name: BroBots (Ashtito, CrunchyHuman, Dog Melon)
description:
BroBots is a cooperative puzzle-platformer that strives to create positive experiences through play, in order to strengthen relationships and social bonds between individuals, whether they’re together or apart. BroBots encourages players to collaborate as a team, working efficiently together in order to overcome the challenges that await.

CONTROLS 
(We recommend using a controller)

MOUSE AND KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

WASD = Move
MOUSE = Look Around
SPACE = Jump
SHIFT = Dash
RMB = Attract
LMB = Repluse

PLAY STATION/XBOX CONTROLS:

LEFT JOYSTICK = Move
RIGHT JOYSTICK = Look Around
X/A = Jump
O/B = Dash
LEFT TRIGGER = Attract
RIGHT TRIGGER = Repulse

BroBots has only just begun. We've got a prototype ready, and we have HUGE plans for the future. To start with, we're planning loads of different crate types, plenty more BroBot customisation options, and many fun online multiplayer game modes!

If you love BroBots and you want to see it developed more, we would greatly appreciate it if you support us - small donations can help us continue development! 

DEVELOPING TEAM

Ashtito - 3D Artist/Level Design

Melon Dog - Programmer/Sound Effects

CrunchyHuman - Programmer/UI
